hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint:ci && npm run db:format

scripts.dev:db: docker run --name postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=${DB_PASS} -e POSTGRES_USER=${DB_USER} -p ${DB_PORT}:${DB_PORT} -d postgres:alpine && docker run --name neo4j -e NEO4J_PASSWORD=${NEO_PASS} -e NEO4J_BOLT_PORT_NUMBER=${NEO_BOLT_PORT} -p ${NEO_BOLT_PORT}:${NEO_BOLT_PORT} -e NEO4J_HTTP_PORT_NUMBER=${NEO_HTTP_PORT} -p ${NEO_HTTP_PORT}:${NEO_HTTP_PORT} -e NEO4J_HTTPS_PORT_NUMBER=${NEO_HTTPS_PORT} -p ${NEO_HTTPS_PORT}:${NEO_HTTPS_PORT} -d bitnami/neo4j:latest
scripts.dev: npm run db:up && concurrently --kill-others 'prisma generate --watch' 'ts-node-dev --no-notify src/app.ts'
scripts.db: npm run db:migrate && npm run db:up
